text: Ara tara tadera dharana anuyayi bale, â€˜esaba gabadi pasu o sasyaksetra nisid'dha; amara yake icche kari se chara ke'u esaba khete parabe na,â€™ ebam kichu sankhyaka gabadi pasura pithe arohana nisid'dha kara hayeche ebam kichu sankhyaka pasu yabeha karara samaya tara allahara nama neya na. E sabakichu'i tara allaha sambandhe mithya ratanara uddesye bale; tadera e mithya ratanara pratiphala tini acire'i taderake debena
